value.title: AI Self-Driving Cars Telling You To Keep Your Hands, Feet, And Head Inside The Vehicle At All Times
value.excerpt: For your safety, keep your hands, feet, and head within the vehicle at all times, which is equally important for riders of self-driving cars, so here's what needs to be done.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Wants You and Your Job
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence (AI) behind the soothing voice telling us where to turn has replaced passenger-seat navigators, maps, even traffic updates on the radio. How on earth did we survive before this technology arrived in our lives?

value.title: Why Artificial Intelligence Isn’t Intelligent
value.excerpt: Some AI experts think that the name itself is fueling the kind of hype and confusion that have led to “AI winters” in the past.

value.title: Argo AI can now offer the public rides in its autonomous vehicles in California
value.excerpt: Argo AI, the autonomous vehicle technology startup backed by Ford and VW, has landed a permit in California that will allow the company to give people free rides in its self-driving vehicles on the state’s public roads.

value.title: What the U.S. Can Learn From Europe’s Approach to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Americans have good reason to be skeptical of artificial intelligence. Tesla crashes have dented the dream of self-driving cars. Mysterious algorithms predict job applicants’ performance based on little more than video interviews.

value.title: Tesla AI Day To Be Held On August 19, says Elon Musk
value.excerpt: Tesla is having an event called Tesla AI Day on August 19, company CEO Elon Musk has announced. Tesla had a Tesla Autonomy Day in 2019, and Tesla Battery Day in 2020, but it never had an event solely dedicated to artificial intelligence.

value.title: Google-linked Waymo lobbies UK on driverless car rules
value.excerpt: Waymo, Google’s driverless-car sister company, has warned against the UK imposing strict rules for self-driving vehicles in one of its first interventions in Britain. value.title: Tesla Full Self-Driving explained: Its capabilities, cost and puzzling over-promise
value.excerpt: Perhaps the most overly optimistic technology in all of the auto industry is Tesla's Full Self-Driving package. No car for sale to the general public can do what that name says. Here's what it really does and how to get it on your Tesla.

value.title: Ford Teams With Lyft, Argo AI For Self-Driving Ride-Shares This Year

value.title: Tesla knocked $500 off a hardware upgrade for its Full Self Driving subscription after customer backlash
value.excerpt: Tesla offered customers with older cars a $1,500 Full Self-Driving hardware upgrade, provoking a backlash. Now, it's charging $1,000.

value.title: Chinese driverless car start-up WeRide makes first acquisition as competition ramps up
value.excerpt: Chinese driverless car start-up WeRide has made its first acquisition, an autonomous trucking firm called MoonX, as it looks to commercialize self-driving tech.

value.title: How Artificial Intelligence can create real value for your business
value.excerpt: Whether we ask Amazon’s Alexa to play our favorite song or shout “Hey, Google” before asking the device a question to help our child with their homework, artificial intelligence (A.I.) has been in the spotlight more frequently in the past few years in consumer applications.
